discourse_list.title: "Lost Connection" error on Firefox and Chrome

content.content: Hello, this is my first post on this forum, however, I have been a long-time user of OASIS.app I hope feedback here is allowed. I’m getting the titular error when attempting to pay back all my DAI debt with the “Changing Vault” action. I tested both Firefox and Chrome and tried the trezor bridge as well as metamask with trezor connected. This error can be reproduced in all cases. I didn’t assume there was a backend server, as dapps often are static, but apparently, the error indicates that there is one. Here is the behaviour of the site when trying to change the vault. I did not get a transaction to sign:  screenshot983×692 59.4 KB  And this is the error text:  Lost connection   It looks like we lost a connection to some data. Hit reload below to reload your page. If this error persists, please get in touch at [email protected]  I did send a support email but I hope there is a google-searchable discussion here so users with similar issue can stop bothering the support. I repeated the test with Singapore and Australian IP address with the same error.

Hi @weiwu, Welcome to the forums. Thanks for getting in touch via the support e-mail. I understand from the Oasis.app support team that your specific case has since been resolved. The Lost Connection error showed up misleadingly, whilst this was a calculation error. We will make sure that this error is properly shown to users.
This topic was automatically closed 91 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.
